SkLite-Python: Use transpiled scikit-learn models in Flutter¶

Release v0.0.1. (Installation)

Note

The Python suffix in the package name serves as an identifier, as the Dart SkLite package is the target library which needs to be used in your application.

Note

SkLite-Python supports Python 3.6 or later. There will be no support for earlier versions.

Easily transpile scikit-learn models to native Dart code aimed at Flutter. The package supports a number of scikit-learn models:

IMPLEMENTATION

STATUS

KNeighborsClassifier

✓

SVC

✓

GaussianProcessClassifier

DecisionTreeClassifier

✓

RandomForestClassifier

✓

MLPClassifier

✓

AdaBoostClassifier

GaussianNB

✓

QuadraticDiscriminantAnalysis

BernoulliNB

✓

LinearSVC

✓
